response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth to you lies at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price that reflects its unique qualities and benefits, while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $1,350,000. I believe this figure strikes a balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the perceived value to you. I look forward to your thoughtful consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
